title: SELECT instrctr, ttl, uuid, avg, pss, fl, adt WHERE instrctr includes kind
query: In courses dataset courses, find entries whose Instructor includes "kind"; show Instructor and Title and UUID and Average and Pass and Fail and Audit; sort in descending order by Average.
